meanings.definition: Already coded or programmed before use.
meanings.sent1: The precoded software made it easy to set up the new computer.
meanings.sent2: The precoded instructions saved a lot of time during the project.
meanings.sent3: The precoded message on the cake made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her precoded response to the question was like a well-rehearsed script.
meanings.sent5: The precoded map guided them through the forest with ease.

meanings.sent1: We used the precoded template to design the website quickly.
meanings.sent2: The precoded settings on the device simplified the setup process.
meanings.sent3: The precoded alarm went off at the wrong time, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: His precoded plan for the event was executed flawlessly.
meanings.sent5: The precoded answers in the quiz made it seem too easy.
